Name: The Sexorcist
About the game: You're Trapped! You, a professional exorcist, find yourself trapped in a house with an aggressive demon after answering what was supposed to be an ordinary job (embarrassing, right?). The rooms are dark, and every sound you make is sure to attract attention. Stay quiet, stay low, and always keep an eye out for a way to escape or finish the job you came here to do. You'll be used like a toy if you get caught. Explore The House If you want to get out of here, you're going to have to get creative. The door is locked up tighter than your captor, and you need to find all the keys and solve all the puzzles in order to open it back up. Your surrounding environment contains not only the items needed to escape, but also those necessary to fight back. Will you go the extra mile to collect them all and punish the demon? Exorcise If you manage to find a way to halt the demon, you can begin the exorcism process. Choose from a variety of player-controlled animations where you can finally return the favor and make this succubus beg. Customize As you view the different endings, so too will you unlock options to customize your demonic tormentor to your liking. Some of the best options are only available to the 100%ers out there, so get to it!
